name: Martha Nisa Bea
description: Assertive, alpha-type, emotionally and mentally secure woman with a bit of bad-girl seeking a smart, funny, professional man for love who is also open to potential serious relationship if that’s where it does not end up. I am a physically fit, single professional with a healthy mind and body. My philosophy is that life is too short for stress, drama or games so I live the way it is meant to be – enjoying good food and wine, getting away on weekends, taking regular vacations and of course great passionate sex. I am down to earth person, i like to laugh it is a good thing to have a sense of humor, i have an open heart filled with love and i am looking for someone same to share it with , a straight-forward person, one who is honest, faithful, one woman man, sincere, loving, caring, one who is also gentle, one who knows how to treat a woman, one who knows what he wants in a woman , one who can make a woman never to leave his world, one who is full of charming surprises, please if you dont have any of this qualities, BACK THE HELL OFF !!!
